txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Heavy carapaces from the insects and spiders surrounding Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'We will find a way to use these. Thank you.'
'I think that we can find a way to make use of the different parts of the insects and spiders. Bring me anything that you might find.'
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of heavy carapaces to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the Heavy Carapaces to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton

You have been tasked with collecting and delivering heavy carapaces from the insects and spiders surrounding Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Heavy carapaces from the insects and spiders surrounding Oatbarton.
